import sys

def binarysum(n):
    ans=0
    for i in range(0,n+1):
        x=i
        while(x!=0):
            y=x%2
            ans=ans+y
            x=x/2
    return ans

def main():
    t=input()
    while(t>0):
        n=input()
        ans=binarysum(n)
        print ans
        
        t=t-1

main()
sys.exit(0)
